home.text: Individuals and Couples: Ages from 11 – Senior Adults
Consultations for parents concerning their children ages 3-10 ( Anxiety, Depression, IEP’s, 504’s)
The Therapy You Need For Your Growth

It is hard enough to go through life worrying you or your loved one are all alone in this. I will be here for you every step of the way. In working together you will grow to feel comfortable and free with yourself.
Committed to You, Committed to Your Future
Maureen Tamillow is dedicated to growth and healing for a wide range of emotional and behavioral issues.

With over 30 years of solid experience, she has developed a unique and exacting approach to get results for; developmental crises, psychodynamic approaches to counseling, parental support, couples, and identity formation.
Maureen Tamillow is dedicated to growth and healing for a wide range of emotional and behavioral issues.

With over 30 years of solid experience, she has developed a unique and exacting approach to get results for; developmental crises, psychodynamic approaches to counseling, parental support, couples, and identity formation.

“My family has had the privilege of having the benefit of Maureen’s invaluable experience, compassion and commitment for more than 13 years. I cannot express just how much she has helped my son, who she began seeing at age 5 and then me as she transitioned to my therapist as my son became older. During my initial contact with her as my 5 yr old son’s therapist she helped us both significantly, my son, with his behavior through recognizing his triggers and providing coping strategies and me in providing constant support and unequaled commitment to both of us. She has helped me through many difficult issues, caring for an elderly parent, marital issues, self- discovery, dealing with an emotionally challenged child, etc.. Maureen is extremely responsive which is essential for continuity of care as well as being available when we need her. It’s actually one of the most remarkable things about Maureen. It still blows my mind when I reach out to her and she is back to me in a timeframe which is unheard of in any medical profession today. Her memory of over 13 years of information involving us is astounding. Even if we have taken extended breaks from sessions it is as if I saw her yesterday. Maureen’s many years in the education system as well as her extensive education has been invaluable for our family. When we experienced a very serious situation with regard to school Maureen was with us all the way. Available for frantic calls as what to do now or how to handle end execute the next step. She was essential to saving my sons academic career and that is no exaggeration. Without her the outcome would have been catastrophic. She attended meetings with me where her expertise and knowledge of the school system was the difference between devastation and redemption. I am not exaggerating at all. In addition to all of this Maureen has also provided many concrete and fruitful recommendations for other professionals. When it was time for my son to find another therapist her recommendation has brought another wonderful therapist into my son’s life which has been a life saver. I love Maureen Tamillow and am in awe of her abilities and her heart. This testimonial for her is an honor.”

“I have worked with Maureen for over 30 years. She helped me choose a college and college major based on my preferences and interests. She assisted me as I navigated graduate school, entry into the workforce, and an eventual career change. I would not be where I am without her – happy in my chosen field working at a job I love. Her knowledge and patience are priceless. I highly recommend her.”

“As a clinical psychologist, I am honored to have Ms. Tamillow as a colleague and professional resource. I have had the pleasure of collaborating with Ms. Tamillow on a number of cases over the years and am always impressed with her insights and focus, and, through our work together, know firsthand how deeply she cares about her clients. Her highly ethical, extremely knowledgeable, and compassionate approach to their care is rivaled by few. Additionally, she has a unique set of skills from her vast experience with diverse populations in both the clinical and educational settings that make her an asset to the mental health community as a whole. Her talents are to the advantage of all who cross her path.”

Over 30 years of experience goes into every client. Maureen offers a highly personalized approach tailored to each of her client’s individual needs to help attain the personal growth they’re striving for.

about.text: We start off with a discovery phone call, to find out what you are looking for in a therapist to see if we are a right fit for eachother or not. If not, I have a sufficient referral network to find you the help you need.
We will then work together and move towards developing your vision and goals for yourself.
After our sessions, the plan is that you will have a more holistic life, with a satisfying career, personal relationships, friendships, and activities.re.
I HAVE DEVELOPED A PROVEN APPROACH TO RECAPTURE YOUR BEST SELF

There are times when a chronic health condition creates mental health issues. Maureen has had two years of active observation and work. She did this practicum work and observations at two of the RIC (Rehab Institute of Chicago) satellites. Elk Grove Village and Willowbrook. These opportunities make the health and wellness and mind body growth factor a very real and positive approach for this office. At this location, therapists have worked with patients with chronic conditions: multiple sclerosis, crone’s disease, various cancers, diabetes and several immune diseases. Maureen, specifically, has worked with young people at schools when they have had Lupus, Rheumatoid Arthritis, and Sickle Cell Anemia, in addition to the prior listed illnesses. An honest and positive approach to disease has helped many patients lead more fulfilling lives and reduced their physical symptoms.

There is a time to grow and change. I will be with you every step of the way helping you or your loved one feel brand new. It starts with a phone call.

faqs.text: Maureen’s network is not limited to just other therapists. She has a vast network of professionals and will find you the help you need.

wellness.text: Tamillow therapy helps you confront and overcome your issues; and achieve potential in different aspects of you life.

We assist client to explore all aspects of their lives from personal, relational, physical, spiritual, mental, financial, and career, to create and find balance, well-being, and satisfaction in life. We have a comprehensive assessment that helps clients to explore all aspects of their lives to see how balanced their lives really are and to achieve that balance. We also offer individual and group sessions in personal development and psycho-educational classes, such as : Organizing and De-cluttering Your Life; Financial Health and Abundance; Making Peace with Your Past; Creating the Life You Want; Exploring Your Dreams and Manifesting Them; Vision Maps; Finding Balance, Health, Peace, & Success Through Wellness.
Committed to You, Committed to Your Future

In changing and growing, a whole new world will open up to you or your loved one. Maureen Tamillow has 30+ years of experience perfecting her craft. She is unconventional and goes far beyond your typical therapy session.

counseling.text: Tamillow Therapy offers a comprehensive variety of counseling and therapy skills so that we can tailor your treatment according to your specific needs. We listen to your story and then adapt the treatment according to your specific issues and using your individual strengths and resources.

Maureen Tamillow has 30+ years of experience perfecting her craft. She is unconventional and goes far beyond your typical therapy session. Something not listed below, but Tamillow therapy is held at high regard for: ADDICTION THERAPY.
She is also well versed in educating parents on how to get their needs met. Also, instructs on how to go through and understand the process of either IEP or a 504.
Finding volunteer options through self discovery
Doing what you’ve always planned on doing

coaching.text: Let’s find you a career that doesn’t feel like work

Maureen has had extensive experiences in a variety of work settings. She understands the expectations of a variety of business cultures. She is also aware that you spend more time in your career, then in your family and personal relationships.
The goal of this process is to find the right career path for you. A job that you will find excitement, growth and purpose in.

Preparation involves exit planning, market statement development, separation document review and counsel, emotional support system and job search calendar development. Candidates may also meet with a certified financial planner.

Assessment tools help individuals evaluate their style, skills, rewards, values and career interests. Resume, References and Communication Tools: Our services include professional resume development services; coaching on how to select, manage and communicate with references; and training on e-mail and cover letter writing skills with examples.

Assessment tools help individuals evaluate their style, skills, rewards, values and career interests. Resume, References and Communication Tools: Our services include professional resume development services; coaching on how to select, manage and communicate with references; and training on e-mail and cover letter writing skills with examples.

Maureen works with you on refining your interview skills. Going over, questions to ask employer, how to answer questions from employer and effective ways to handle yourself when you do not know how to respond.
Committed to You, Committed to Your Future
